name: Penguin Island
description:
Penguins love sitting on islands.

Penguins are cute.

Explore unlimited generated islands and relax as you find all the penguins.

__________Controls__________

Click on penguins to make them swim.

Right click to zoom in and aim with the center pointer.

Finding all 5 penguins will generate a new island.

Esc. to quit.

Enjoy : )
